title: 22Gfay on San Diego, Having ADHD, Lil Maru, Friends Switching Up & More
description:
22Gfay talks about doing his first interviews, missing No Jumper for getting into a high speed chase, Lil Maru and more.

---
00:00 Intro
0:00 - 22Gfay joins for his third-ever interview
1:33 - Being 19 years old, growing up skating in San Diego, getting into music after a good response to his first song on SoundCloud
2:45 - Gfay remembers his first song and learning how to record
4:03 - Growing up bouncing between mom and dad
5:11 - Dropping out of high school during sophomore year. Having ADHD
8:12 - Gfay's favorite subject and why he got kicked out of Spanish class
11:52 - Taking off after posting a snippet with Lil Maru
12:47 - Mom was not happy when he first got into music
16:00 - Importance of having a support system and dealing with stress
18:30 - Gfay missed his last interview because he got into a high-speed chase on the way to his No Jumper interview
25:12 - Gfay’s ideal girl is older, has a BBL, and her own place
28:46 - Being open to dating an older girl with a kid
30:40 - Biggest musical influences: Michael Jackson, Lil Durk, Chief Keef, ASAP Rocky. Favorite artist from San Diego is Hardini
33:47 - Bigger artists tapping in. Being disappointed after meeting big rappers
34:18 - Gfay won’t reveal the secret big feature on his upcoming project
35:00 - Getting ready to go on tour with Bravo the Bagchaser
35:41 - Gfay on the new wave of young rappers rising out of San Diego. Refuses to rank them
38:06 - Gfay on his new project coming soon in October


---
